EXTRACTED VALUE: RTS based on the LOTR franchise seems like a perfect fit, and the fact that it plays so good on a console makes this one a clear winner.
If you've got kids of a gaming age then they'll enjoy playing this and, thanks to the excellent two-player mode, you'll still get to join in.
This is one of those rare titles that add strength to the argument of games as art. Get it.
The menus not only seem convoluted, but are very difficult to navigate.
